    • 方法详细资料

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public static Player getCurrentPlayer()
        get current player
        返回:
        current player

      • fortification

        public void fortification(Country source,
                          Country target,
                          int armyNumber)
        Method for fortification operation
        参数:
        source - The country moves out army
        target - The country receives out army
        armyNumber - Number of armies to move

      • attack

        public void attack()
        attack phase method

      • reinforcement

        public void reinforcement()
        Reinforcement phase Set new current player Add armies to the player

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        Set current player to the next one according in round robin fashion If a new round starts from the next player, send ROUND_ROBIN STATE to view Considerations: 1. When allocate armies at start up phase, when the last player finishes army allocation, this method tells view round robin starts; 2. In round robin, when the last player finishes fortification phase, this method tells view round robin starts again, meanwhile change current player to the first player.

      • allocateArmy

        public void allocateArmy(Country country)
        allocate one army in a specific counry
        参数:
        country - Country reference

      • initiatePlayers

        public void initiatePlayers(int numOfPlayers,
                            PlayerView playerView)
        create Player object for every Player, and add the observer Players are allocated a number of initial armies notify CountryView (country info notify PlayerView (current player) notify View (state and additional info)
        参数:
        numOfPlayers - number of players
        playerView - the observer

      • readFile

        public void readFile(java.lang.String filePath)
              throws java.io.IOException
        load the map from a player chose map file validate map file initiate continents,countries and players notify View
        参数:
        filePath - The path of the map file
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - io exceptions

        public void linkCountryObservers(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,CountryView> countryViewHashMap)
        link every country in the countries with corresponding CountryView
        参数:
        countryViewHashMap - The CountryView map

        public boolean isValidFile()
        report if the loaded map file is valid or not
        返回:
        true if the map file is valid; otherwise return false
